# scale(to:)

**Instance Method**

Scales the sprite node to a specified size.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func scale(to size: CGSize)
```

```swift
func scale(to size: CGSize)
```

## Discussion

This method works by setting the sprite node’s [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKNode/xScale] and [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKNode/yScale] to achieve the specified size in its parent’s coordinate space.

## Setting a Sprite’s Size and Position

- **Using the Anchor Point to Move a Sprite**: Learn how the anchor point affects a sprite’s position.
- **size**: The dimensions of the sprite, in points.
- **anchorPoint**: Defines the point in the sprite that corresponds to the node’s position.
